text: The Face Vietnam season 3 () is a Vietnamese modeling-themed reality television series, based on the US television series of the same name, and one part of the international The Face franchise. After two seasons produced by Cat Tien Sa, this year the show was acquired by Multimedia JSC and therefore was modified entirely from the broadcast channel to the panel of mentors and host. Supermodel Võ Hoàng Yến, singer and actress Minh Hằng and supermodel Thanh Hằng became mentors this season, while former Vietnam's Next Top Model judge Nam Trung served as host. The third season premiered on 30 September 2018 on VTV9. This season, both male and female contestants are allowed to compete. Team Thanh Hằng's Mạc Trung Kiên, a male contestant from Hải Dương, won the finale on December 30, 2018. ==Contestants== (ages stated are at start of filming) {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" !colspan=2|Name !Age !Height !Hometown !Model Coach !Finish !Place |- ! style="background:#9cf;"| |Nguyễn Huy Quang |23 | |Hải Dương | Hoàng Yến |Episode 2 |15 |- |- ! style="background:#9cf;"| |Brian Trần Đắc Lộc |27 | |Westminster, England | Hoàng Yến |Episode 3 |14 |- ! style="background:#9cf;"| |Nguyễn Xuân Phúc |26 | |Hà Nội | Minh Hằng |Episode 4 |13 |- ! style="background:#9cf;"| |Nguyễn Phạm Minh Đức |28 | |An Giang | Thanh Hằng |Episode 5 |12 |- ! style="background:#faafbe"| |Trần Tuyết Như |23 | |Hồ Chí Minh | Hoàng Yến |Episode 6 |11 |- ! style="background:#faafbe"| |Hồ Thu Anh |22 | |Hà Nội | Thanh Hằng |Episode 8 |10 |- ! style="background:#faafbe"| |Nguyễn Thị Lệ Nam |22 | |Tiền Giang | Thanh Hằng |Episode 9 |9 |- ! style="background:#faafbe"| |Hoàng Như Mỹ |21 | |Lâm Đồng | Minh Hằng |Episode 10 |8 |- ! style="background:#faafbe"| |Bella H'Đok |26 | |Đắk Nông | Minh Hằng |Episode 11 |7 |- ! style="background:#9cf;"| |Trương Thanh Long |35 | |Lâm Đồng | Minh Hằng |rowspan="3"| Episode 12 |rowspan="3"| 6-4 |- ! style="background:#faafbe"| |Bùi Linh Chi |22 | |Hà Nội | Thanh Hằng |- ! style="background:#9cf;"| |Tôn Thọ Tuấn Kiệt |23 | |Hồ Chí Minh | Hoàng Yến |- ! style="background:#faafbe"| |Lê Thị Trâm Anh |23 | |Bình Phước | Minh Hằng |rowspan="3"| Episode 13 |rowspan="2"| 3-2 |- ! style="background:#faafbe"| |Nguyễn Quỳnh Anh |19 | |Hà Nội | Hoàng Yến |- ! style="background:#9cf;"| |Mạc Trung Kiên |21 | |Hải Dương | Thanh Hằng |1 |} ==Episodes== ===Episode 1=== First aired 30 September 2018 In this casting episode, the first time of "The Face" series has extended the range for contesants involved, both of guys-and-girls can become a "The Face Vietnam". It is shown again on screen TV with two challenges: Catwalk with the hiding face in a hat and taking a photo with their true beauty in groups including two or three models, they have to perform before the judges. In the induction video, mentor Thanh Hằng with joining of mentor Võ Hoàng Yến even host Nam Trung, who were main judges for Vietnam's Next Top Model, while Minh Hằng first appears with as mentor role, after controversy with Hồ Ngọc Hà at season 2. After 3 months of completing the casting, 35 models passed to pick-team round. Three mentors's personalities are clearly revealed in pick-team ring like a reality story of Tam and Cam, if Hoàng Yến was an evil girl, oppositing Minh Hang was very sweetness. Thanh Hằng seems a calm and decisive leader. 15 models through to the common house. * Team Võ Hoàng Yến: Brian Trần Đắc Lộc "Brian Trần", Tôn Thọ Tuấn Kiệt, Trần Tuyết Như, Nguyễn Quỳnh Anh, Nguyễn Huy Quang * Team Thanh Hằng: Mạc Trung Kiên, Bùi Linh Chi, Hồ Thu Anh, Nguyễn Phạm Minh Đức "Mid Nguyễn", Nguyễn Thị Lệ Nam * Team Minh Hằng: Hoàng Như Mỹ, Trương Thanh Long, Lê Thị Trâm Anh, Bella H'Đơk, Nguyễn Xuân Phúc ===Episode 2=== First aired 14 October 2018 In this episode, 15 models were taken to the common house, where they have a mini challenge from host Nam Trung, who have to run by their feet to dispute the rooms. Later, they meet Minh Hang at the master class about spoken skills inspired by speech. Long was a convincing victory with the special guest even other contestants. * Mentor master class: Minh Hằng * Winning master class: Trương Thanh Long 15 models have to take a video with black-and-white clothings in this challenge's main theme "The Golden Has Returned Again". Three mentors are extreme tension in their errors. Mrs. Thiên Hương - who represent for Her World magazine, she chose team Thanh Hằng to win of the campaign. Hoàng Yên nominated Quang to get in dark room to be risky face to face with his ex-mentor, because Hoàng Yến thought Minh Hằng will be sent Mỹ or Bella, But she worried, Thanh Long, who is chosen, not both of them. So Quang have to leave of the competition. Hoàng Yến was loud with Thanh Hằng and she declare a war. * Winning coach and team: Thanh Hằng * Bottom two: Nguyễn Huy Quang & Trương Thanh Long * Eliminated: Nguyễn Huy Quang * Special guest: Trấn Thành, Thanh Duy, Trần Nguyễn Thiên Hương ===Episode 3=== First aired 21 October 2018 14 contestants moved to CITIGYM and they had a lesson body liberation with music under Hoàng Yến's guidance. It have 3 dancing styles: Hiphop, Strong by Zumba and Sexy dance. Như, Phúc and Mid balanced the score of the teams. After that Kiệt won the final victory for team Hoàng Yến. * Mentor master class: Võ Hoàng Yến * Winning master class: Tôn Thọ Tuấn Kiệt They have been taking part in a promotion video for CITIGYM. Hoàng Yến was completely defeated with the weakest performance of the contest by her contestants. Mr. Thảo Quân chose team Minh Hằng to win, while other two teams showed a disapproving attitude, because she used to be the representative for this brand. In the black room, Brian and Kiên landed in the bottom two, Minh Hằng organized a dancing challenge to choose who was stayed. She gave Kiên added a chance to change in upcoming challenges. Hoàng Yến wasnot unexpected, she would like to fix named to "The Bè Lũ"! * Winning coach and team: Minh Hằng * Bottom two: Brian Trần Đắc Lộc & Mạc Trung Kiên * Eliminated: Brian Trần Đắc Lộc * Special guest: Jacinda, Nguyễn Thảo Quân ===Episode 4=== First aired 28 October 2018 13 contestants have been taken to Vietnam's shopping center - ROBINS, who were checked Mix-and-Match with different outfits by mentor Thanh Hằng. At the challenge, one member of each teams have to choose a fashion style such as: Street style, Sporty, Office, Rock and Glamour, only team Hoàng Yến has fewer than contestants among three teams, so Hoàng Yến's models will do two more time. Như is rectified for her disrespectful attitude by the judges. Phúc, Mỹ and Kiên, Chi added one points for team Minh Hằng and Thanh Hằng. And Nam received the final victory * Mentor master class: Thanh Hằng * Winning master class: Nguyễn Thị Lệ Nam "Nam Anh" Today's challenge, three teams have to take part in a viral video for MAC Cosmetics brand on a turning table tagged in a sidestep with the camera is hung in the air. They donot use speech but this during viral, the models will perform by their dancing skills. After two weeks lost, Hoàng Yến suddenly won the first victory. She entered the elimination room with landed in the bottom two are: Chi and Phúc. Phúc is contestant, who has to leave of the competition in this episode. Synonyms, Chi is stayed with her mentor. * Winning coach and team: Võ Hoàng Yến * Bottom two: Bùi Linh Chi & Nguyễn Xuân Phúc * Eliminated: Nguyễn Xuân Phúc * Special guest: Hà Đỗ, Abigail Baniqued, Adam Lâm ===Episode 5=== First aired 4 November 2018 Minh Hằng is once again stood at master class to guide acting skill for the contestants, she teaches about "eye contact", who has an exciting lesson and the contestants so worship her. At this challenge, the models have to pose with covering by their eyes in an artificial forest. Chi is winning with as good personal, who landed in the low at before elimination. * Mentor master class: Minh Hằng * Winning master class: Bùi Linh Chi 12 contestants * Winning coach and team: Võ Hoàng Yến * Bottom two: Nguyễn Phạm Minh Đức & Hoàng Như Mỹ * Eliminated: Nguyễn Phạm Minh Đức ===Episode 6=== First aired: 11 November 2018 * Mentor master class: Võ Hoàng Yến * Winning master class: Team Minh Hằng * Winning coach and team: Thanh Hằng * Bottom two: Trần Tuyết Như & Bella H'Đơk * Eliminated: Trần Tuyết Như * Special guest: Trần Uyên Phương ===Episode 7=== First aired 18 November 2018 * Mentor master class: Minh Hằng * Winning master class: Nguyễn Quỳnh Anh * Winning coach and team: Minh Hằng * Bottom two: Tôn Thọ Tuấn Kiệt & Mạc Trung Kiên * Eliminated: None * Special guest: Hirofumi Shiramatsu ===Episode 8=== First aired 25 November 2018 * Mentor master class: Thanh Hằng * Winning master class: Hồ Thu Anh * Winning coach and team: Minh Hằng * Bottom two: Tôn Thọ Tuấn Kiệt & Hồ Thu Anh * Eliminated: Hồ Thu Anh * Special guest: Gael Hornebeck ===Episode 9=== First aired 2 December 2018 * Mentor master class: Võ Hoàng Yến * Winning master class: Trương Thanh Long * Winning coach and team: Võ Hoàng Yến * Bottom two: Lê Thị Trâm Anh & Nguyễn Thị Lệ Nam * Eliminated: Nguyễn Thị Lệ Nam * Special guest: Trần Nguyễn Thiên Hương ===Episode 10=== First aired 9 December 2018 * Winning master class: Team Minh Hằng * Winning coach and team: Thanh Hằng * Bottom two: Tôn Thọ Tuấn Kiệt & Hoàng Như Mỹ * Eliminated: Hoàng Như Mỹ * Special guest: Kirk McDonald Park ===Episode 11=== First aired 16 December 2018 * Winning master class: Bùi Linh Chi * Winning coach and team: Võ Hoàng Yến * Bottom two: Mạc Trung Kiên & Bella H'Đơk * Eliminated: Bella H'Đơk * Special guest: Stefan Reicherstorfer, Trần Uyên Phương ===Episode 12=== First aired: 23 December 2018 * Winning master class: Nguyễn Quỳnh Anh * Winning coach and team: Minh Hằng * Eliminated: Trương Thanh Long, Tôn Thọ Tuấn Kiệt & Bùi Linh Chi * Special guest: Trang Lê, Nadav Eschar, Galit Gutman, Doron Lebovich, Keren Naftali ===Episode 13: Final Walk Live=== First aired 30 December 2018 * Final three: Nguyễn Quỳnh Anh, Lê Thị Trâm Anh & Mạc Trung Kiên * Special guests: Trang Lê, Nguyễn Công Trí * Musical performances: Minh Hằng, Chi Pu * The Face Vietnam: Mạc Trung Kiên * Winning coach and from the competition. : The contestant withdrew from the competition. : The contestant was a runner-up. : The contestant won The Face Vietnam 2018. * Episode 1 was the casting episode. The final fifteen contestants were divided into individual teams of five as they were selected. * In episode 7, team Minh Hằng won the campaign. Võ Hoàng Yến nominated Tuấn Kiệt while Thanh Hằng nominated Trung Kiên for elimination. Minh Hằng did not eliminate either of them. * In episode 12, team Minh Hằng won the campaign but still can choose only one contestant to send to the Final Walk. Team Minh Hằng's win only means that they will be given the middle position on stage in the Final Walk. ===Campaigns=== *Episode 1: Casting. *Episode 2: One Shot Video Theme: "The Golden Age Has Returned". *Episode 3: CITYGYM One Shot Video. *Episode 4: MAC Viral Clip. *Episode 5: Rohto's "Because The Eyes Are Priceless" Poster. *Episode 6: Macchiato Milk Tea One Shot Video. *Episode 7: Rohto's Products Viral Clip. *Episode 8: ROBINS - Central Group's Brands TVC. *Episode 9: Herworld's Fashion Video. *Episode 10: ALMA Resort TVC & Poster. *Episode 11: Macchiato Milk Tea TVC. *Episode 12: Israel Viral Clip. *Episode 13: Final Walk. == References == Category:Vietnamese reality television series Category:Vietnam Television original programming Category:2010s Vietnamese television series
